alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:08PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pinal County through 530 PM MST... At 506 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Red Rock moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and localized areas of blowing dust across Interstate 10 near Red Rock. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Rock. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 221 and 227. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park
